animatedlist



struct AnimateDef;
An animated texture definition. Animated textures cycle through textures in the order they are stored in the TEXTURE lumps.

ubyte type;
Type of this animation. 0 for textures, 1 for flats.

string textureLast;
The last and first texture name in this animation list to cycle inbetween.

uint speed;
The speed at which the texture changes, in tics.

struct SwitchesDef;
A switch texture definition. Switch textures have an on and off texture.

string textureOff;
The texture names to be used for the switch states.

ushort iwad;
Defines the IWAD the the switch textures are a part of. 1 for shareware IWADs, 2 for shareware Doom, 3 for shareware, Doom or Doom II.

class AnimatedList;
Holds a list of Boom style texture animations and switch texture definitions.

See http://doomwiki.org/wiki/ANIMATED and http://doomwiki.org/wiki/SWITCHES for more information about these lumps and their format.

void readFrom(WAD wad);
Reads animated textures and switch textures from a WAD file.

Params:
WAD wad The WAD file to read animations and switches from.

void addTo(WAD wad);
Writes an ANIMATED and SWITCHES lump containing the animations and switches in this list to a WAD file.

Params:
WAD wad The WAD file to add the lumps to.
